variable.name: shareid
variable.description: SHARe ID number

variable.name: RW_WOR5
variable.description: Now I am going to spell a word forward and I want you to spell it backwards. The word is world. W-O-R-L-D. Please spell it in reverse order.
variable.value: Not administered for reason unrelated to cognitive status
Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: WORLD5
variable.description: Score of WORLD variable
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_1
variable.description: What is the date today? (month, day, year)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_2
variable.description: What is the season?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_3
variable.description: What day of the week is it?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_4
variable.description: What town, county, and state are we in?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_5
variable.description: What is the name of this place? (any appropriate answer, for instance my home, street address, heart study)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_6
variable.description: What floor of the building are we on?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_7
variable.description: I am going to name 3 objects. After I have said them I want you to repeat them back to me. Remember what they are because I will ask you to name them again in a few minutes: Apple, Table, Penny.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_8
variable.description: What are the 3 objects I asked you to remember a few moments ago?
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_9
variable.description: What is this called? (Watch)
variable.value: unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_10
variable.description: What is this called? (Pencil)
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_11
variable.description: Please repeat the following: "No Ifs, Ands, or Buts."
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_12
variable.description: Please read the following & do what it says.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_13
variable.description: Please write a sentence.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_14
variable.description: Please copy this drawing.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MM5_15
variable.description: Take this piece of paper in your right hand, fold it in half with both hands, and put in your lap.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: COGSCR5
variable.description: Total score for cognitive function test
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test

variable.name: MAXCOG5
variable.description: Maximum score a participant can get based on the questions answered.
variable.value: Unknown or did not take the test
